data.title: Too many rude younger people.
data.text: I guess my husband and I are too old for this place on the weekends. We go in here some weekdays for a beer and it's nice and relaxing. I play music from my phone while we chat. But on the weekends is a totally different story. The music is Pop or Hip Hop and nothing but the youngins. Some didn't even look 21 but they were checking IDs at the door. Some of the people are very rude. The music is loud so you can't talk and the place is so packed you can't get a drink. We won't be returning.

data.title: Nice local find
data.text: Went for St Pats day and had really good corn beef.  Draft beer selection in kind of limited.  Live music on some nights and nice dart area.

data.title: Home town pub -Great friends meeting place
data.text:
We visited Huey's on a road trip from Sacramento to Dallas with family. This is a nice little bar with a very "local" feel and extremely nice, friendly staff. The atmosphere was laid back and comfortable, the décor was renovated historical building -very nice.  Huey’s Pub provide live music several days a week including Live Band Karaoke on Wednesday nights along with various live bands and artists on Fridays and Saturdays. The pub is equipped with three 50″ HD flat screen televisions and a 108″ projection room for sports viewing.
We had a really great time playing pool, drinking and meeting friends of family. Everyone was having a good time and friendly. I would recommend a stop in here for drinks and fun when in Vacaville.
